name: Andarduft Balancing Shampoo
description: A gentle yet effective shampoo designed to reduce excess oil and leave hair fresh.

reviews.comment: Never thought Andarduft Balancing Shampoo could tame me wild mane this good. It’s almost too clean, but I’ll take it!
Me hair’s smoother than a boulder after using Andarduft Balancing Shampoo, smells like victory!
Me hair’s fresh, but I was hoping for more grime to stay. Andarduft Balancing Shampoo did too good of a job!
Feels like I dipped me head in a mountain spring after using Andarduft Balancing Shampoo. Best I've ever had!
Andarduft Balancing Shampoo works like a charm, me hair’s shinier than me favorite rock!

long_description: Give your troll mane the balancing care it deserves with the Andarduft Balancing Shampoo. Packed with natural extracts and the legendary Andarduft, this shampoo helps reduce excess oil while leaving your hair fresh as a mountain breeze. Say goodbye to unruly locks and the sticky twigs that come with them! It even wards off those pesky insects that seem to love troll hair. A clean troll is a happy troll, after all! Perfect for keeping your wild hair in check after a day of adventuring.
how_to_use: Wet your hair thoroughly with warm water.
Apply a generous amount of Andarduft Balancing Shampoo to your scalp.
Massage gently into the scalp and through the lengths of your hair.
Rinse thoroughly and repeat if necessary.

name: Andarduft Purifying Conditioner
description: A lightweight conditioner that nourishes without weighing down greasy hair.

reviews.comment: Feels like I dipped me head in a mountain spring after using Andarduft Purifying Conditioner. Best I've ever had!
Andarduft Purifying Conditioner got the job done, but now me hair smells too fancy for me taste. Could use more mud!
Me hair’s fresh, but I was hoping for more grime to stay. Andarduft Purifying Conditioner did too good of a job!
Andarduft Purifying Conditioner made me hair softer than the fur of me best beast-skin rug. Worth every shiny coin!
Good clean, but Andarduft Purifying Conditioner took away me trollish stink! Too soft now, but still solid work.

long_description: Is your troll hair weighed down by too much grease? Fear not! The Andarduft Purifying Conditioner nourishes without making your hair feel heavy. Perfect for trolls who want to keep that wild look, but with a bit more shine and less dirt. It's like giving your locks a refreshing dip in a crystal-clear stream! With its light and invigorating scent, you'll feel like you've just returned from a mythical spa deep in the forest.
how_to_use: After shampooing, apply Andarduft Purifying Conditioner to the lengths of your hair.
Comb through with your fingers or a wide-tooth comb.
Leave the conditioner on for 2-3 minutes.
Rinse well with cool water for best results.

name: Andarduft Refreshing Scalp Scrub
description: Exfoliates and purifies the scalp to reduce oil buildup.

reviews.comment: Andarduft Refreshing Scalp Scrub cleans well enough, but I miss the swampy smell. Guess I’ll just roll in dirt later.
Andarduft Refreshing Scalp Scrub worked, but made me hair too shiny! Now the other trolls be laughing at me.
Andarduft Refreshing Scalp Scrub got the job done, but now me hair smells too fancy for me taste. Could use more mud!
Andarduft Refreshing Scalp Scrub made me hair softer than the fur of me best beast-skin rug. Worth every shiny coin!
Me hair’s fresh, but I was hoping for more grime to stay. Andarduft Refreshing Scalp Scrub did too good of a job!

long_description: Exfoliate your troll scalp with the Andarduft Refreshing Scalp Scrub! Say goodbye to buildup and hello to a cleaner, lighter feel. With a blend of magical ingredients and the legendary Andarduft, your scalp will feel as fresh as a misty morning in the mountains. It's perfect for trolls who love to roam but hate the grime that comes with it. A fresh scrub means less itching, more roaring!
how_to_use: Wet your hair and part your hair in sections.
Take a small amount of Andarduft Refreshing Scalp Scrub and apply directly to your scalp.
Massage gently with your fingertips for 2-3 minutes.
Rinse thoroughly, ensuring all scrub particles are removed.

Apply Andarduft Moisture Lock Shampoo to your scalp.

Work it through the mid-lengths to ends.
Leave on for 5-10 minutes for deep conditioning.
Rinse thoroughly and style as usual.
